channel.title: Teleport panels
channel.description: Ok, like i wanna be able to type like ::training, then a thing pop up in the chat screen with selections of teleports, please help :p

item.title: Teleport panels
item.dc:creator: @emtscape emtscape
item.description:
@emtscape wrote:

my source is i think stabbingscape, so where would i add this? client.java?

YOUR POST

That would be dialogue then

the command would look like this
Code: [Select]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“training”)) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(100, npcType); }
In DialogueHandler class

Code: [Select] case 100: sendOption3(“train1”, “train2”, “train3”); c.dialogueAction = 100; break;
then just make the dialogue action tele you to wherever you want to go

MY POST

so for the “train1"train2"train3” would i make seperate commands for those?

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport panels
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

emtscape:

ok like, if ur chatting with an npc, and he gives u options to select… Like that

That would be dialogue then

the command would look like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("training")) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(100, npcType); }

In DialogueHandler class

case 100: sendOption3("train1", "train2", "train3"); c.dialogueAction = 100; break;

then just make the dialogue action tele you to wherever you want to go

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport panels
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Well im not sure there is an already added interface that would fit what you are trying to do,

so you will have to do what all servers do, which is make a custom interface, which is also client sided

unless you just want a dialogue option with places to go

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

emtscape:

Ok, like i wanna be able to type like ::training, then a thing pop up in the chat screen with selections of teleports, please help

Which interface do you want to pop up?

For something like this, you would probably want to make a custom one

or just have a dialogue show with teleport options
